## Installing Packages


## Question 1: Panel Data

```{r}
# Get data from OECD dataset
gas<-read.delim(file="http://www.wiley.com/legacy/wileychi/baltagi/supp/Gasoline.dat")

write_delim(gas, path="OECD.Rdata")

```

## Question 3: Social Survey

```{r}


if(file.exists("gss.xls")==FALSE){
  download.file("http://www.uta.edu/faculty/story/DataSets/GeneralSocialSurvey1996ExcelDataStudentVersion.xls",destfile="gss.xls")

  
}else{
  gss<-read_excel("gss.xls",skip=0,col_names = TRUE)
}

#Save data
write.csv(gss,"gss.csv")
```

#Question 4: Replication File- Statistical Discrimation

```{r}
#Getting the data
maindata<-read_csv(file="http://users.nber.org/~rdehejia/data/psid_controls.txt")

#Saving as a CSV file
write_csv(maindata,path="maindata.csv")

#Previewing data
head(maindata)

#Saving as a Rdata file
save(maindata,file="maindata.Rdata")

#Previewing data
head(maindata)

```
